Laura bush and michelle obama are serving as honorary cochairs for welcome.us.welcome.us . the group is aimed at engaging all americans to welcome and support refugees . 17 of those who have already arrived are us citizens and lawful permanent residents and can head to their destinations without first passing through military bases . they will go to bases to receive medical screening including covid 19 vaccinations before they are relocated to communities around the country . support for housing via airbnb meals and ad credits from facebook and walmart to promote the organization .
